body.name: Paula's Choice Skin Recovery Calming Toner, 6.4 Ounce Bottle Toner for The Face, Sensitive Facial and Dry Redness-Prone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: THIS HYDRATING TONER BOTH SOOTHES & NOURISHES dry flaky skin & helps revitalize & moisturize. Fights the signs of aging & calms redness while infusing skin with antioxidants to minimize the effects of free-radical damage & environmental stress.

Paula's Choice SKIN RECOVERY Calming Toner gently soothes and delivers key ingredients like skin-defending antioxidants, essential lipids and skin-restoring ingredients to help eliminate dry, flaky skin as it hydrates and leaves skin feeling smoother.

Use this hydrating, soothing toner as part of your skin-calming morning & evening facial skin care, after your favorite Paula's Choice cleanser. Follow with exfoliator, serums, spot treatments & moisturizer. For daytime use an SPF 30+ moisturizer.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whatever your skincare concern, whether dryness, acne, fine lines, or sensitive skin; we've got a treatment line for you. The search for amazing skin care ends here. Finally, you found it.
SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: As part of our pledge to the planet, we’re removing extra plastic from packaging, like shrink wrap.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Who We Are About Paula Skin care visionary Paula Begoun founded our company with one goal—help people uncover the truth about skin care. Over 35 years ago, she set out to discover which products would actually transform skin’s appearance and health and which were just fluff. True to that legacy, Paula’s Choice Skincare formulates effective products rooted in scientific research and backed by real results. Beauty Begins with Truth Since 1995 we’ve been questioning ingredients, following the facts and standing up for the consumer, because you deserve products that work exactly as they claim to. We do the research and formulate smart, efficacious products that transform skin of all ages and types for the better. Smart Beauty Philosophy You deserve smart skin care choices—minus all the hype. Our philosophy? Smart Beauty. Because the products you use should work and be good for your skin, no exceptions. Our formulas are effective, safe and backed by cited research we share with you along the way. Smart. Safe. Effective. Fragrance-free. Cruelty-free. Non-Irritating. Made in the USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: definitely super hydrating for the skin, it does have more of a water based consistency. my skin is super sensitive to most products that i’ve used but this one does what it says, calms and cools the skin and i’ve noticed a small difference in the redness in my skin as well. definitely recommend adding this toner to your skincare routine! ദ്ദി (˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶)~✧

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensitive fair skin
reviews.reviewText: Love love loveThank you for making me feel less scary about getting older ((47))*perfect for sensitive skin that is easily effected by ingredients(There’s two kinds of sensitive)*people that have skin problems*people that have issues with ingredientsI’m the second one I need something that is not harsh for me and for my older skin*dryness*unevenness in skin tone ( dry patches / little red around the nose and discoloration under eyesI can’t express how much I love this productI went all out and bought everything except cleanser (because I still had some) however I’m going to buy that tooCheck out my pictureEverything I bought is for dry / sensitive skinThis is the first time I found a toner that actually fits what it preaches my skin is easily effected by always drying out this product has done the opposite*feel soft /clean*moisturizing*helpful*perfectly pricedI can see the difference and the ingredients they paired together is genius

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great toner. Very soothing, calming, very hydrating. The only thing is the bottle. I prefer spray bottles for toners. I don’t like putting it on my hands first or piece of cotton. I like toners going directly on my face. But that’s just my personal preference. The product is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It stopped my skin irritation almost instantly, I’m floored rn.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this toner regularly since I got it, last night I used another toner (Tea Time...not bad still just not life changing)) and a buffet of products on my face, most of which were hyaluronic acid niacinamide glycolic and vitamin c (I might avoid aha/vit c combo in the future) I woke up at three in the morning to use the loo and get some water and noticed my face was itchy... I looked in the mirror... my face was red around my mouth and underneath my eyes... I got my water went back to bed and tried not to touch it, when I woke up I could tell the skin was swelling around my mouth, nothing crazy but very concerning nonetheless bc a week before I had this same issue with my eyes, I suspect the vit c that most likely caused this issue, it was a very high concentrate and the only thing I used on both days my face acted up, sorry for the rant, anyways... I ordered this toner bc I was desperate to get my skin back on track, it was still dry and flaky from what happened the week before, that along with the cere ve pm moisturizer has helped me greatly and I should have stuck to that regimen for at least two weeks instead of jumping back to my stronger products, so anyways I washed my face real well (hydro boost cleanser, not my fave but never messes with my skin) and put this toner on... almost instant relief... within five minutes the itching was gone and the redness dissipated, I am so grateful for this product right now, if you’re using vitC/AHA/BHA/PHA products this is a MUST (along with SPF 30+!!!!), I wish I got this sooner, that said... I’m going to my dermatologist later today (last week was so bad I went to urgent care), this product is stopping the redness and itching but it’s not an automatic salve for a serious skin irritation, it will provide relief but you need to go to a doctor and find out why it happened.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a really gentle toner and targets redness it leaves the skin feeling refreshed and clean without stripping it or making it have that tight feelingSense using using it I have notice the redness in my skin has gone down significant and I will continue to purchase

I have extremely sensitive skin, it's very dry, large pours and I break out as a result of a number of products. This has made a significant difference in my complexion and it doesn't break me out. I am so thankful I found this. It's particularly good when paired with a moisturizer.
